choices: It's okay I won't hurt you.
I don't like beeing poked by spear!!!
1.content:
You have been in the woods for a long time and you just wanted to get away from the house for a bit, but you realize that you are lost and you can't find your way back.
You look for any sign that might help you find your way, but it's hopeless and you finally rest in an open field and fall in a deep sleep. You suddenly wake up because something sharp was poking you. You look down and you see a young girl no taller than your index finger was staring at you holding a spear in her hand.
You try to reach for her, but the girl runs and trips over a rock flat on her face. You quickly grab her in your hand and you get a closer look as she sits on the pom of your hand. She looks about thirteen years old wearing some kind of Indian outfit. The young girl is terrified of you and stutters "Ppp...please don't eat! I'm sorry i ppp...poked you with my spear! I...dd.... don't taste very good! I'll.... I'll give you indigestion!" So you say.......
1.title: a very little girl!!!

choices: A man walk up to you.
A child walk up to you.
11.content:
"It's okay I won't hurt you" you say "Are you hurt you had quite a fall there?"
The young Indian girl looks at you confused, but still scared, "Yes,...I'm all right." "All right can you help find my way home," you say to her, "I think I'm lost." "Well..." she said, "maybe the grand elder can help you just put my down and follow me."
So glad that the young Indian girl is helping you you put her down on the ground and follow. You do your best not to step on her when suddenly you here you belly give a low grumble.
You pat your belly gently and hope they have some decent food they can offer you. The young Indian girl stops in front of a small village with little tie-pee tents while the little people did there chores. The young Indian girl goes in the the middle of the village as you wait outside.
All the villagers notice your preasents and most went inside their tents, but other just stood in awww. You sit down Indian style and wait for their return then you saw......
11.title: It's okay I won't hurt you.

choices: How do you I ate someone!
111.content:
He is walking very strangely and realize is drunk he grabs a spear and yells, "stop talking to my wife you dog!" He then pokes you in the toe and you yelp out loud you stare do at him very hard, but he continues to poke you so you quickly grab in you hand and shove him into you mouth.
The man started to struggle realize he is in trouble.
Your enjoying the taste of him despite the man being drunk, "Mmmmm" you say then you lift your head and swallow hard you can feel the man going down your throat, past your chest and in to your stomach.
You lick your lips savoring the taste of the man and then you pat and gently rub your belly. You can feel the man in your belly squirming around trying to find his way out of your belly, but it was useless he is nothing more than a tasty snack to you and you let out a satisfied burp to announce the world he is gone forever, "buuuuuuurrrrrrrrp."
The people of the village stare at you and then panic some ran back into their tents others ran straight to the center of the village and that's when the elder showed up along with the young Indian girl and the whole village. Uh oh you thought and looked at all the little people feeling a bit guilt of eating their kind, but not so much.
The elder looked about 90 years old and said, "go straight ahead make a left on a blue stump and then right on a green one and you should be home." "Thank you," you say about to get up "Just a moment," said the elder very anger, "you ate some one didn't you?" Everyone in the village looks at you and you say......
111.title: A man walk up to you.

1111.content:
"How do you know I ate someone" you say. The elder points at your slightly bulged belly and says, "you stomach is bulging just a little so you did you eat!" The villagers stare at you waiting for an answer.
Finally, you say, "some drunk guy why?" "TOM," a woman screams, "you monster give him back!" Suddenly, a woman comes at you a small knife in her hand. You quickly grab her in your fingers, lift her to your face, you look at the woman with hunger in your eye because you still hungry and you say, "would you like to join him?"
The woman stares at you with anger in her eyes and said, "NO NEVER, ATTACK MY VILLAGERS, ATTACK!!!!"
The whole village people start to attack you and you stuff the woman in your mouth and swallow feeling her squirm all the way down your throat and into your belly.
You grab another young woman and you do the same for her too.
You continue to grab the villagers and swallow them until your belly is full and there was one villager squirming in your mouth to get out. "STOP," said the elder, "before we become extinct." The rest of the villagers stop trying to fight you.
You then swallow the the villager in your mouth then let a huge belch, "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!" and sigh as you gently rub your now bloated belly and look down to see the rest of the Indian villagers.
" Fallow the fir tree path then turn left you should find your home there," said the elder, "Leave NOW and never come here again."
You get up to leave and your belly is very heavy so you use one hand to hold it up and walk out of the village.
Suddenly a small man with a spear stands in your way saying, "I don't care what the elder says your going to die right here, right now." He tries to stab your toe, but you grab him in your hand and say, "looks like i got a little snack on the way home."
Licking your lips you lift the man over your mouth and let go of him, he falls straight into your mouth lifting your head you swallow hard feeling the small man going slowly down your throat, past your chest and in to your stomach.
You can feel the villagers squirming around inside your belly trying to find their way out, but it was of no use they were nothing more than just a tasty meal to you. You let a huge belch, "BEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLCCCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHH!" and sigh as you gently rub your swollen belly. "What a tasty flavor for a village hic," you say with a smile, "I might just visit that village again," and with a full belly you walk home your belly all ready digesting the villagers in your belly for you next visit for another meal.
1111.title: How do you know I ate someone!

112.content: The tan-skinned little boy standing there looked very friendly and was kind to his mother but when he saw you he hid behind her skirt. "It's okay, Simon," she said, "She will not hurt you." I asked her if she had anything for me to eat. "I'm very hungry of course" i said "and I don't want to eat a living creature like you or your son there." She brought me a piece of leftover meatloaf. I hate meatloaf, plus, it's so tiny how could it fill me up? But she might turn on me if I refuse it.
112.title: The indian's son

choices: A man walks up to you.
The grand elder walks up to you.
12.content:
So you say angrily, "I don't like being poked by spear." Licking your lips you say, "my tasty little morsel," and suddenly you hear your stomach growls hungrily. You pat you belly gently then look at the the young Indian girl she looks at your belly then at you and says, "Please, no don't eat me at my village we have plenty of things for you to eat just put me down and I'll show you."
You think for a moment and thought Well I know one little girl is not going to fill me up, but maybe a whole village can. You smile at the thought and your stomach growls as if to agree. "Very well," you say to the young Indian girl, "but if you pull any tricks and.... well," you pat your belly saying no more to explain her fate.
You put her down and follow her and you try your best not to step on her. The young Indian girl stops in front of a small village with little tie-pee tents while the little people did there chores.You sit down Indian style as the young Indian girl spoke, " Every please gather whatever food you have and bring them here to me quickly!"
Everyone in the village stared at her then at you and everyone ran into their tee-pee houses grabbed their food and ran to the young Indian girl. By the time the villagers had gathered all of their food in one place they relaxed a little knowing they might be safe.
You look down at the pile of food and it's barely a mouth full compared to you. "What is this," you say disgustedly, "I am not pleased by your rations of food." You smash the food with your hand and stare hard at the frighted villagers. When suddenly.....
12.title: I don't like beeing poked by spear!!!

choices: I was hungery..... and I still am.
121.content:
He is walking very strangely and realize is drunk he grabs a spear and yells, "stop talking to my wife you dog!" He then pokes you in the toe and you yelp out loud you stare do at him very hard, but he continues to poke you so you quickly grab in you hand and say, "I think I have my tasty little meal right here," and shove him into you mouth.
The man started to struggle realizing he is in trouble. You enjoy the taste of him despite the man being drunk, "Mmmmm" you say then you lift your head and swallow hard you can feel the man going down your throat, past your chest and in to your stomach.
You lick your lips savoring the taste of the man and then you pat and gently rub your belly. You can feel the man in your belly squirming around trying to find his way out of your belly, but it was useless he is nothing more than a tasty meal to you and you let out a satisfied burp to announce the world he is gone forever, "buuuuuuurrrrrrrrp."
The people of the village stare at you and then panic, everyone runs in different directions most are running into each other. "Mmmm," you say, "That's just how I like my little morals scrabbled and a little bit runny."
You grab a young woman in your hand shove her in your mouth and swallow feeling her squirm all the way do your throat and into your belly. You continue to grab the villagers and swallow them until your belly was full you thought you were going to burst and only one person was left in the village. You let a huge bleach, "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!" and sigh as you gently rub your now bloated belly and look down to see the last of the Indian villagers it was the young Indian girl you meet before.
She looks at you with tears in her eyes, "why did you eat my people......why?" You look at her and say, "I'm sorry little one," and you pick her up between your index finger and your thumb put her right up to your face and say.....
121.title: A man walks up to you.

1211.content:
You light her over your mouth and say, "Good-bye, my little morsel I'm sure you taste very good."
With that you let go of her and she falls straight into your mouth lifting your head you swallow hard feel the young Indian girl going slowly down your throat, past your chest and in to your stomach.You can feel the villagers squirming around inside your belly trying to find their way out, but it was of no use they nothing more than just a tasty meal to you.
You let a huge bleach, "BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!" and sigh as you gently rub your swollen belly.
Suddenly you just realized that you eat the only people who can help you find your way home you hear a low gurgle in your belly now that you not going to starve for a while, but it will be a very, very, very, long walk home.
1211.title: I was hungery..... and I still am.

choices: Fill yourself right there and then.
122.content: "I'm sorry that our hard work amounts to nothing to you," he says angrily "but if you go South West for a quarter of a mile than turn right you will be home and you can eat all you want!" You consider hard. Your house would supply more food than their supplies. However, you might not want to walk 1/4 mile to eat. You decide to...
122.title: The grand elder walks up to you.

1221.content: You decide to run home and get something to eat. After all, they wouldn't make much of a meal, right? After supper, you wonder if you should use them for dessert or leave them alone.
1221.title: Go home.

choices: You find the village with ease.
12212.content: You had such a small supper. It wasn't even enough to be remotely filling, so it is decided that you will return to the small village for some desert. Maybe a bit of dessert. Probably a lot of dessert. You hope you can find it again. On the plus side, you think you can find your way home when you're finished. You think about the grand elder's directions and realize that all you have to do is back trace them. You set out, determined not to get lost, but to find the small desert village.
12212.title: Go back to the village for desert

1223.content: You don't want to wait, so you pick up your first snack and eat them. Just than, the man who is not usual very far behind the grand elder, comes over. It is the man himself, the village wizard. "You will atone for your sins, giant," he begins with a deep and loud voice "Or you will pay dearly." You figure that you might as well shut him up and eat him next. But moments later you realize your mistake. You begin to shake and your belly starts to feel sick. Next thing you know, you've blacked out. When you awake, you are the size to them that they were to you. You can see the wizard and your first snack alive and well. The grand elder says, "we could eat you, but we are not like you. Instead you will pay a different way." You are tied up, despite you frequent apologizes. During the night, when you wonder when they are going to untie you. You see some ants coming. They untie you and take you with them. You come to a bad ending.
1223.title: Try and eat the village.

info.brief_description: Are your new little people friends or tasty little morsels
info.description:
You are lost in the woods hoping you can find your way home.
(You can continue the story were i left off if you like)
